wiki.content:
"Go with the Flow" is a song by Queens of the Stone Age from the album Songs for the Deaf, released as a single in 2003. At the 46th Grammy Awards, the song was nominated for Best Hard Rock Performance.
 
 The music video for the song was filmed in England by Shynola. At the 2003 MTV Video Music Awards, it won Best Special Effects and was nominated for Best Art Direction. The video—rendered in black, white, and red—features the band performing at the back of a pickup truck driving through a desert highway.
 
 The song was featured in the video games Freestyle Street Soccer, SingStar Amped, Madden 09,Juiced 2, Gran Turismo 4, SingStar Rocks! and Rock Band as a playable track.
 
     * Norwegian electronic music duo Röyksopp has recorded a cover version/remix of this song which is on their Röyksopp's Night Out EP.
 
     * German electronic music group Northern Lite has recorded a cover version of this song which is on their album Temper.
 
     * Pitty recorded a cover version for a Brazilian radio station.

At the 2003 MTV Video Music Awards, it won Best Special Effects and was nominated for Best Art Direction. The video—rendered in black, white, and red—features the band performing at the back of a pickup truck driving through a desert highway.
